commit message: Added new options to sync audio and subtitles.

Merge pull request #27 from pollonamid/master

update german translation

Merge pull request #3 from SyncedSynapse/master

Merge changes

Merge pull request #28 from jonas2515/master

Update german translation

Merge pull request #29 from NEOhidra/master

updated Bulgarian translation

Fixed notification service to restart when the process is killed (return START_STICKY)
Remove notification and stop service when the user removes the app from recent apps
Remove the need of creating extra files to build
Changed the check to enable/disable audiostreams and subtitles options in the now playing screen: The previous check didn't cover all video types
FIX: draw selector on host selection (non-touch usage)

Merge pull request #36 from koying/fixhostnontouch

FIX: draw selector on host selection (non-touch usage)
Changed settings to always use Default Shared Preferences. Settings is now only an interface with the definition of the keys stored in Shered Preferences
Fix crash during adding a new host, when zeroconf returns a host without any address and the user selects it
Fixed Mime types of the provider
Changed README and legal info to point to Kodi/XBMC Foundation
